channel.title: Devastation-X
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/290zg2e.png[/img]
Base: DSPK Client Base: DSPK Client
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2d7xbwh.jpg[/img] The goals of this server is to make a Pking/Skilling server with all bugs/glitches/dupes fixed (well I can't fix all) with a perfect economy with a friendly community. I will show a list of updates I already worked on.
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/o5qcro.jpg[/img] Server/Coder:Me Forums Developer:Me and My friend Sammy Developers:Look for one or two Lead Programmer:Me I am looking for two [b]GFX designers[/b] I am also looking for [b]5 Beta Testers.[/b]
[b]If you would like to apply use this format:[/b] [code]Name: How old are you?: What role are you applying for?: Any previous experience in this role?: MSN Contact Information?[/code]
If you would like to email me my MSN is: dakotachest@live.com
[size=18pt][b]Update Log[/b][/size] [code]Added working curse prayers + all leeches except leech run energy. Fixed most dupes and glitches. Added new shops. Added rocktails giving bonus 10 hp. Added EP instead of you staying in wilderness to gain it. Added Npc Clipping. Fixed Pvp combat. Added Pk Points you cant kill yourself to gain it. Added Gaming manual for new players. Added restriction time gotta wait 15 minutes (came with source) Fixed food timer. Added real runescape drinking potions. Added quest tab information. Added full primal client sided. Added fishing (still needs a little work) Added better range system Added better melee system Added better magic system Added tzhaar maps client sided Added caskets[/code]
If you would like to email me my MSN is: dakotachest@live.com
(I will post pictures and updates on the project)
The project will be in Beta testing on the 24th So I will need beta testers![/center] [center][URL=http://tinypic.com/r/30scbyc/7]Skillcape trimming[/URL][/center]

item.title: Devastation-X
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Holy fuck people! [quote=“gurlz, post:9, topic:392172”]all the things you have done to this server have been realsed as server tutorials for p.i.[/quote][quote=“Nexus_, post:7, topic:392172”]Oh look! Another DSPK leeched with a changed name and home layout!

Fucking great.[/quote]
So what? At least he’s making an attempt!

Anyway… Add some pictures, videos, whatever. I wouldn’t suggest DSPK, but since I’m guessing your new (due to the fact of your rep, ect) its fine for beginners. I would suggest Hyperion or Azure, I would love to code on of these 2, but my co owner says its too hard… Lol. Well, anyway, looks great and good luck to you and I hope to see this go far.

Also, you can trust Loveandpower. He’s great.

Read full topic

item.title: Devastation-X
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

[center]

Base: DSPK
Client Base: DSPK Client


The goals of this server is to make a Pking/Skilling server with all bugs/glitches/dupes fixed (well I can’t fix all) with a perfect economy with a friendly community. I will show a list of updates I already worked on.


Server/Coder:Me
Forums Developer:Me and My friend Sammy
Developers:Look for one or two
Lead Programmer:Me
I am looking for two GFX designers
I am also looking for 5 Beta Testers.

If you would like to apply use this format:

Name: How old are you?: What role are you applying for?: Any previous experience in this role?: MSN Contact Information?

If you would like to email me my MSN is: dakotachest@live.com

[size=18pt]Update Log[/size]

Added working curse prayers + all leeches except leech run energy. Fixed most dupes and glitches. Added new shops. Added rocktails giving bonus 10 hp. Added EP instead of you staying in wilderness to gain it. Added Npc Clipping. Fixed Pvp combat. Added Pk Points you cant kill yourself to gain it. Added Gaming manual for new players. Added restriction time gotta wait 15 minutes (came with source) Fixed food timer. Added real runescape drinking potions. Added quest tab information. Added full primal client sided. Added fishing (still needs a little work) Added better range system Added better melee system Added better magic system Added tzhaar maps client sided Added caskets

If you would like to email me my MSN is: dakotachest@live.com

(I will post pictures and updates on the project)

The project will be in Beta testing on the 24th So I will need beta testers![/center]
[center]Skillcape trimming[/center]

Read full topic
